entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story. He is being discussed by Professor McGonagall and Umbridge about his potential to become an Auror.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts who supports Harry Potter's dream of becoming an Auror. She is described as getting to her feet and speaking in ringing tones.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts who opposes Harry Potter's dream of becoming an Auror. She is described as having a fussy, simpering demeanor and speaking in a furiously rising voice.

entities.name: auror
entities.description: An Auror is a magical law enforcement officer who is mentioned as a potential career path for Harry Potter. Professor McGonagall offers to help Potter become an Auror.

entities.name: minister of magic
entities.description: The Minister of Magic is the head of the magical government, mentioned as a potential employer for Harry Potter. Professor Umbridge mentions that the current Minister will never employ Potter.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall offers to help Harry Potter become an Auror, showing her support for him.
Professor Umbridge opposes Harry Potter's dream of becoming an Auror and says the Minister will never employ him.
